hero.title: Create and Discover New Hobby Groups
hero.description: Our online service makes it easy to connect with others who share your interests, whether it's hiking, painting, or playing soccer. Create or join a group, schedule meetups, and enjoy pursuing your passions with new friends by your side. Start building your community today!

auth.passwordUpdatedDescription: Your password has been successfully updated.
auth.signInDescription: Sign in to your account using one of the options below.
auth.resetLinkSentDescription: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password.
auth.magicLinkSentDescription: We sent you a magic link to sign in. Click the link in your email to sign in.
auth.expiredTokenDescription: Sorry, this token was either expired or already used. Please try logging in again

pricing.chooseThePlanThatSuitYouBest: Choose the plan that suits you best. Enjoy full access to premium content and expert support. Start your journey today and achieve your goals!

success.title: You've been upgraded!
success.description: Click below to start using our service

cancel.title: Not interested? No worries at all
cancel.description: Checkout a free starter kit below until you're ready for the premium starter kit
cancel.checkoutFreeStarterKit: Checkout my free next.js starter kit
cancel.letLandingPageConvincedYou: Let my landing page convince you

createRoom.title: Create Room
createRoom.name: Name
createRoom.nameDescription: This is your public room name.
createRoom.descriptionDescription: Please describe what you are be coding on
createRoom.githubProjectDescription: Please put a link to the project you are working on
createRoom.tagsDescription: List your programming languages, frameworks, libraries so people can find you content
createRoom.descriptionPlaceholder: Im working on a side project, come join me

dashboard.title: Your Groups
dashboard.noGroups: Uh-oh, you don't have any groups
dashboard.noOwnedGroups: Uh-oh, you don't manage any groups
dashboard.noOtherGroups: You're not part of any groups
dashboard.createGroupDescription: Create a new group to start managing your events.
dashboard.groupCreatedDescription: You can now start managing your events

danger.title: Danger
danger.deleteGroupDescription: Delete this group and all it's data.
danger.deleteGroupConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this group? All your members will no longer be able to view the group information and all data will be removed from our system.
danger.somethingWentWrongDeleteGroup: Uh-oh, something went wrong deleting your group.

leave.leaveGroupConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to leave this group? If it was a private group an admin will need to reinvite you.

invite.inviteFriendDescription: Enter the email of the person you want to invite to this group.
invite.inviteSentDescription: Tell your friend to check their email.

settings.socialLinksUpdated: Your social links have been updated.
settings.groupImageDescription: Upload a group image to make your group stand out.
settings.groupVisibilityDescription: Groups are private by default. If you want random people on the internet to find and join your group without an invite, switch this to on.
settings.groupDescriptionUpdated: Your group description has been updated.
settings.failedToUpdateGroupDescription: Your description was not successfully updated.
settings.imageUpdatedSuccessfully: You've successfull updated your group image.

posts.title: Posts
posts.createPostDescription: Fill in the form below to create a post.
posts.somethingWentWrongCreatingPost: Something went wrong creating your post.
posts.deletePostDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
posts.somethingWentWrongUpdatingPost: Something went wrong updating your post.
posts.somethingWentWrongCreatingReply: Something went wrong creating your reply.
posts.updateReplyMessage: Update the message in your reply
posts.deleteReplyDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this reply?

members.title: Members
members.kickMemberDescription: Are you sure you want to kick this member from the group?

info.title: Info
info.groupInfoUpdateFailed: The group info failed to update.

events.title: Events
events.createEventDescription: Fill in the form below to create an event.
events.eventCreationFailed: Something went wrong creating your event.
events.imageTooLarge: Your image was too large. It must be under 5MB
events.deleteEventDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this event? Your members might be confused or upset if you delete this event.
events.eventUpdateFailed: Something went wrong updating your event.

danger.deleteAccountDescription: You can delete your account below
danger.deleteAccountSuccessDescription: Your account has been successfully deleted.
danger.deleteAccountConfirmDescription: Deleting your account means you will not be able to recover your data in the future. Please type Please delete to confirm.

profile.profileBioUpdated: Your profile bio has been updated.
profile.profileBioUpdateFailed: Your profile bio failed to update.
profile.profileImageUpdateFailed: Your profile image failed to update.
profile.profileImageUpdated: Your profile image has been updated.
profile.imageTooLarge: Your image was too large. It must be under 5MB
profile.profileNameUpdated: Your profile name has been updated.
profile.profileNameUpdateFailed: Your profile name failed to update.

security.sessionsDescription: If you're logged in on multiple devices, you can force a logout on all of them.

subscription.manageSubscriptionDescription: You can upgrade or cancel your subscription below
